titleStmt.title: The grounds and principles of religion contained in a shorter catechism: (according to the advice of the assembly of divines sitting at Westminster.) To be used throughout the kingdom of England, and dominion of Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by John Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
